mapper.delete:
delete from tbl_activity where id in
#{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_activity set owner=#{owner}, name=#{name}, start_date=#{start_date}, end_date=#{end_date}, cost=#{cost}, description=#{description}, edit_time=#{edit_time}, edit_by=#{edit_by} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, u1.name as owner, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.cost, a.description, a.create_time, u2.name as create_by, a.edit_time, u3.name as edit_by from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u1 on a.owner = u1.id inner join tbl_user u2 on a.create_by = u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on a.edit_by = u3.id order by create_time desc
